affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 具有某种性质/倾向
表形容词, "有…的, 充满…的"

bilingual.source: People don't speak one universal language, or even a handful.
bilingual.target: 人们不会说一种通用语言，甚至是少数几种。

bilingual.source: Quite a lot, according to a handful of scientists quoted in the News Feature.
bilingual.target: 根据《新闻特稿》中引用的少数科学家的说法相当多。
在刚才我们提到的那些少数的地方？

bilingual.source: They are only a handful and are Rightists.
The flowchart has a handful of branch points
bilingual.target: 流程图只有少数分支节点

bilingual.source: The port only employs a handful of inspectors.
bilingual.target: 该港口只雇有少数几名检查人员.

bilingual.source: That factory employs only a handful of workers.
bilingual.target: 那家工厂只雇佣少数的工人。

bilingual.source: A handful must have clung on through the big freeze.
bilingual.target: 肯定有少数细菌熬过大冰封。

bilingual.source: A handful of onlookers stand in the field watching.
bilingual.target: 少数几个旁观者站在现场观看。

bilingual.source: But a handful of students remained blissfully ignorant.
bilingual.target: 不过,少数学生仍对此一无所知.

yingyinNormal.en: Top it with a handful of oats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后再撒上一把麦片。

yingyinNormal.en: This is all you do, very easy. Handful of noodle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只需这么做，非常简单。拿一把面条。

yingyinNormal.en: How many are there like me? A handful over the years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有多少和我情况一样的人？这些年来有那么一些。

yingyinNormal.en: You forget what a handful kids are when they're little, huh?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都忘了小孩子有多麻烦，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: You taught him to sign? Just handful of things. Basic stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你教会他用手语了？就些简单的词，都是些最基本的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: In with the noodles. Good handful or two. And give that a good stir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加入面条，一两把就好，翻炒均匀。

yingyinNormal.en: And I got a handful of pixie dust with your name on it. No, you don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我手里还有一把有你名字的魔法粉。你才没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Ok, so all that's needed now is some noodles, good handful of cooked yellow shi noodles al dente.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在只要再加一些面条，一把煮熟有嚼劲的细面。

yingyinNormal.en: Our rising concern is the handful we believe to be former military. Is any of this actionable? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 引起我们关注的是其中一小部分人是退伍军人。有违法行为吗？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Some long thin strips of red pepper, then some sliced spring onion. And you'll need a handful of beansprouts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将红辣椒切成细长条状，再将大葱切成一些薄片，你还需要一把豆芽。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what, Mitchell? That same little jerk grabs a handful of candy every year. He's my Halloween nemesis.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道吗，米奇尔？就是那个小混蛋每年都拿一大把糖走。他是我的万圣节死敌。

yingyinNormal.en: Next. I've got a pan there of boiling water. So I'm just going to add in about a good handful of yellow chi noodles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来，我这里有一锅沸水。我要往锅里放一大把黄色细面。

yingyinNormal.en: To you? Yes, see, of the handful of women Leonard's been involved with, she's the only one I have ever found tolerable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对你？是的，在那些为数不多的和莱纳德约会过的女人中，只有她还算像个人。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe not. you know? Seriously, three babies are a handful maybe they're you know, looking for a chance to unload one of them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不一定，三个宝宝很多，也许他们正在找机会送走一个。

yingyinNormal.en: Like I want to peel off my own face and tear it in two and then again and again until I have a handful of Sheldon-face confetti.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想扯掉自己的脸撕成两半，然后不停地撕直到我的脸碎成渣。

yingyinNormal.en: All the way to election day. Even if there's only a handful of Republicans with the grit and spit to put up a fight, we can control the conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到选举日。哪怕有那么一小撮，有勇气和决心敢抵抗的共和党人，我们都能控制舆论。

yingyinNormal.en: This is one of the most isolated places in America--about 2,000 square miles dotted with a handful of towns, none with more than a few thousand people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是美国最原始的地方，是约2000平方英里的小镇，居住人口不超过几千人。

yingyinNormal.en: The Alamo was a small, isolated fortress with a handful of patriots inside who felt it was important to stick together and fight for what they believed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿拉莫曾是一个小小的孤立的城堡，里面住着一些爱国人士，他们团结一心为信念而战。

yingyinNormal.en: And then a handful of Chinese mushrooms. Now these are really woody and earthy and fragrant, and these are used to create the most gorgeous stocks in Chinese cooking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后一把香菇。香菇有树木的清香，泥土的芳香，在中餐烹饪中，常用香菇给高汤调味。

yingyinNormal.en: When my father started, they had a handful of chemicals, 1 or 2 or 3. Now it's not unusual for us to have 40 or 50 products available, because without that, the yields will suffer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我爸爸刚开始创业时他们使用数量很少的化学药品1或者2或者3种，现在我们以已经经常使用40或者50种药物了，因为要是不那样做会对土地造成损害。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 直接得来的；直接采购的；直接的

sense_info_list.en: a small number of people or things

examination_example.sentence: Millions of Marconi's contemporaries had the same class, gender, race, and colonial privilege as he, but only a <highlight>handful</highlight> did anything with it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与Marconi同时代的数百万人拥有与他相同的阶级、性别、种族和殖民特权，但只有少数的人能够利用这些特权。

examination_example.sentence: Only a <highlight>handful</highlight> of islands in the Southern Ocean are suitable for sustaining large breeding colonies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 南大洋 (Southern Ocean) 中只有少数几个岛适合维持这种大型繁殖群体。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of something that can be held in one hand

sample.mean: n. 一匙；一匙的量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of something that can be held in one hand

examination_example.sentence: But can you be sure you've noted every snack bar in your car, or every <highlight>handful</highlight> of nuts at your desk?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是你能确定你记下了车里的每一个小吃店，或者你办公桌上的每一把坚果吗？

sense_info_list.en: a small number of people or things

examination_example.sentence: Millions of waterfowl (水禽) were killed at the hands of market hunters and a <highlight>handful</highlight> of overly ambitious sportsmen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百万只水禽死于市场猎人和少数野心勃勃的运动员之手。

examination_example.sentence: I bought a <highlight>handful</highlight> of perfectly ripe small strawberries and a little sweet melon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我买了一把完全成熟的小草莓和一个小甜瓜。
